body_html:
All I can think of is playing with these flags:
https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/x86-Options.html

I wont be able to look into this, as it is pretty difficult to get old CPUs for me these days, but I am happy to review contributions, if the code needs any modifications.
Bazel team also may have some ideas @lberki to check, or redirect within bazel team.

body:
All I can think of is playing with these flags:
https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/x86-Options.html

I wont be able to look into this, as it is pretty difficult to get old CPUs for me these days, but I am happy to review contributions, if the code needs any modifications.
Bazel team also may have some ideas @lberki to check, or redirect within bazel team.
